InitialContent.promptExample1: Create a board with a sequence that tells a magical and adventurous story with sea animals.
InitialContent.promptExample2: Show a family with a mother, son and grandmother in a house interacting.
InitialContent.promptExample3: Illustrate imaginative stories about adventures and friendships between children and animals.
